name: phrel

body.origin:
|- wrel(ccphlo)
-| wss(ccphlo, cnv)
-| wrel(cnv)
-| wi(wss(ccphlo, cnv), wi(wrel(cnv), wrel(ccphlo)))
body.pretty:
⊢ Rel(CPreHilOLD)
⊣ CPreHilOLD ⊆ NrmCVec
⊣ Rel(NrmCVec)
⊣ (CPreHilOLD ⊆ NrmCVec →(Rel(NrmCVec)→ Rel(CPreHilOLD)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wrel(ccphlo)
-| wss(ccphlo, cnv)
-| wrel(cnv)
-| wi(wss(ccphlo, cnv), wi(wrel(cnv), wrel(ccphlo)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ Rel(CPreHilOLD)
⊣ CPreHilOLD ⊆ NrmCVec
⊣ Rel(NrmCVec)
⊣ (CPreHilOLD ⊆ NrmCVec →(Rel(NrmCVec)→ Rel(CPreHilOLD)))

body.origin:
|- wss(ccphlo, cnv)
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), ccphlo), wcel(cv(hs0), cnv))
-| diffsc(hs0, ccphlo)
-| diffsc(hs0, cnv)
body.pretty:
⊢ CPreHilOLD ⊆ NrmCVec
⊣ (hs0 ∈ CPreHilOLD → hs0 ∈ NrmCVec)
⊣ d(hs0, CPreHilOLD)
⊣ d(hs0, NrmCVec)

cumulated.origin:
|- wrel(ccphlo)
-| wrel(cnv)
-| wi(wss(ccphlo, cnv), wi(wrel(cnv), wrel(ccphlo)))
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), ccphlo), wcel(cv(hs0), cnv))
-| diffsc(hs0, ccphlo)
-| diffsc(hs0, cnv)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ Rel(CPreHilOLD)
⊣ Rel(NrmCVec)
⊣ (CPreHilOLD ⊆ NrmCVec →(Rel(NrmCVec)→ Rel(CPreHilOLD)))
⊣ (hs0 ∈ CPreHilOLD → hs0 ∈ NrmCVec)
⊣ d(hs0, CPreHilOLD)
⊣ d(hs0, NrmCVec)

cumulated.origin:
|- wrel(ccphlo)
-| wrel(cnv)
-| wi(wss(ccphlo, cnv), wi(wrel(cnv), wrel(ccphlo)))
-| diffsc(hs0, ccphlo)
-| diffsc(hs0, cnv)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ Rel(CPreHilOLD)
⊣ Rel(NrmCVec)
⊣ (CPreHilOLD ⊆ NrmCVec →(Rel(NrmCVec)→ Rel(CPreHilOLD)))
⊣ d(hs0, CPreHilOLD)
⊣ d(hs0, NrmCVec)

cumulated.origin:
|- wrel(ccphlo)
-| wi(wss(ccphlo, cnv), wi(wrel(cnv), wrel(ccphlo)))
-| diffsc(hs0, ccphlo)
-| diffsc(hs0, cnv)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ Rel(CPreHilOLD)
⊣ (CPreHilOLD ⊆ NrmCVec →(Rel(NrmCVec)→ Rel(CPreHilOLD)))
⊣ d(hs0, CPreHilOLD)
⊣ d(hs0, NrmCVec)

comment: The class of all complex inner product spaces is a relation. (Contributed by NM, 2-Apr-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
